name: DrunkRun
description:
Hello everyone, we are a team of three people from Brazil: one programmer, one digital artist and one musician. This is our first game jam and pretty much our first game. We hope you all enjoy what we have come up with.

[ABOUT THE GAME]

In DrunkRun you drank a bit too much and now you need to run to the bathroom as fast as possible! Drink the beer to remove 5 seconds from the timer, but be aware: drinking will remap your keyboard controls. You will also be given a medal at the end of each level based on your time. Please, feel free to send us feedback or bug reports. Also share your times on the comments section!
